About this unit

Have you ever wondered what it takes to make drawings come to life? Well, we have to speak to our computer in a special language. In this unit, we will learn how to use the programming language JavaScript and Processing JavaScript to make our own drawings and animation.

Intro to programming

If you're new here, watch our intro video and get a brief tour of our programming course. Then get coding!

Learn

  • What is Programming?
    (Opens a modal)
  • Learning programming on Khan Academy
    (Opens a modal)

Drawing basics

We'll show you the basics of programming and how to draw shapes.

Learn

  • Making drawings with code
    (Opens a modal)
  • Quick tip: number scrubbing
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Simple snowman
    (Opens a modal)
  • Drawing more shapes with code
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Waving snowman
    (Opens a modal)

Coloring

We'll show you how to color and outline your shapes!

Learn

  • Coloring with code
    (Opens a modal)
  • Quick tip: color picking
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Sunny snowy day
    (Opens a modal)
  • The Power of the Docs
    (Opens a modal)
  • Project: What's for dinner?
    (Opens a modal)

Variables

We'll cover how to use variables to hold values, animate your drawings, and more.

Learn

  • Intro to Variables
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Bucktooth Bunny
    (Opens a modal)
  • More on Variables
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Funky Frog
    (Opens a modal)
  • Review: Variables
    (Opens a modal)

Practice

  • Using variables
    4 questions

Animation basics

Learn how to animate your drawings.

Learn

  • What are animations?
    (Opens a modal)
  • Making animations
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Exploding Sun
    (Opens a modal)
  • Incrementing shortcuts
    (Opens a modal)
  • A shorter shortcut
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Parting Clouds
    (Opens a modal)
  • Project: Shooting star
    (Opens a modal)

Interactive programs

Learn how to make programs that draw shapes based on the mouse location, like painting apps.

Learn

  • Mouse Interaction
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Tasty Tomato
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Mouse movement mania
    (Opens a modal)

Becoming a community coder

Learn how to help your peers on their path to learning programming and how to ask for help yourself.

Learn

  • Ask for help
    (Opens a modal)

Bonus: Resizing with variables

Learn how to use variable expressions to resize parts of your drawing relative to other parts. (This requires a bit more math, so if you don't feel you have a good grasp of fractions yet, you can skip over this.)

Learn

action.element_html:
About this unit

Have you ever wondered what it takes to make drawings come to life? Well, we have to speak to our computer in a special language. In this unit, we will learn how to use the programming language JavaScript and Processing JavaScript to make our own drawings and animation.

Intro to programming

If you're new here, watch our intro video and get a brief tour of our programming course. Then get coding!

Learn

  • What is Programming?
    (Opens a modal)
  • Learning programming on Khan Academy
    (Opens a modal)

Drawing basics

We'll show you the basics of programming and how to draw shapes.

Learn

  • Making drawings with code
    (Opens a modal)
  • Quick tip: number scrubbing
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Simple snowman
    (Opens a modal)
  • Drawing more shapes with code
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Waving snowman
    (Opens a modal)

Coloring

We'll show you how to color and outline your shapes!

Learn

  • Coloring with code
    (Opens a modal)
  • Quick tip: color picking
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Sunny snowy day
    (Opens a modal)
  • The Power of the Docs
    (Opens a modal)
  • Project: What's for dinner?
    (Opens a modal)

Variables

We'll cover how to use variables to hold values, animate your drawings, and more.

Learn

  • Intro to Variables
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Bucktooth Bunny
    (Opens a modal)
  • More on Variables
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Funky Frog
    (Opens a modal)
  • Review: Variables
    (Opens a modal)

Practice

    4 questions

Learn how to animate your drawings.

  • Project: Shooting star
    (Opens a modal)

Interactive programs

Learn how to make programs that draw shapes based on the mouse location, like painting apps.

Learn

  • Mouse Interaction
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Tasty Tomato
    (Opens a modal)
  • Challenge: Mouse movement mania
    (Opens a modal)

Becoming a community coder

Learn how to help your peers on their path to learning programming and how to ask for help yourself.

Learn

  • Ask for help
    (Opens a modal)

action.element_html: What is Programming?
